text: The 2018 Clásica de Almería was the 33rd edition of the Clásica de Almería road cycling one day race. It was part of UCI Europe Tour in category 1.HC. ==Teams== Twenty teams of up to seven riders started the race: ==Result== {| |Final general classification {| class="wikitable" |- ! scope="col" | Rank ! scope="col" | Rider ! scope="col" | Team ! scope="col" | Time |- | style="text-align:center;" | 1 | | | style="text-align:right;" | |- | style="text-align:center;" | 2 | | | style="text-align:right;" | s.t. |- | style="text-align:center;" | 3 | | | style="text-align:right;" | s.t. |- | style="text-align:center;" | 4 | | | style="text-align:right;" | s.t. |- | style="text-align:center;" | 5 | | | style="text-align:right;" | s.t. |- | style="text-align:center;" | 6 | | | style="text-align:right;" | s.t. |- | style="text-align:center;" | 7 | | | style="text-align:right;" | s.t. |- | style="text-align:center;" | 8 | | | style="text-align:right;" | s.t. |- | style="text-align:center;" | 9 | | | style="text-align:right;" | s.t. |- | style="text-align:center;" | 10 | | | style="text-align:right;" | s.t. |} |} == References == Category:Clásica de Almería Clásica de Almería Clásica de Almería
